title: Looking for the best eye appeal PSA/SGC T205 Cobb $5K can get me.
author: DeanH3

posts.post_title: Looking for the best eye appeal PSA/SGC T205 Cobb $5K can get me.
posts.post_content:
I'm on the hunt for a high eye appeal PSA/SGC graded T205 Cobb that $5K can get me. I thought I already had one lined up, but that didn't work out.

Technical grade not important. Centering and registration are top priorities. Would like to avoid major creases if possible. Honest corner wear not a problem either. I know I'm looking for the proverbial needle in a haystack, but figured I'd give it a go.

Thanks in advance.
Figured I'd give this another go. Thanks in advance.

posts.post_title: I've got a good eye appeal SGC 1.5
posts.post_content: Shoot me your email via Pm and I can send scans.  It would be way less than $5K
